channel.title: MattyCraft!
channel.description:
[size=2em][b]MattyCraft[/b][/size] [size=2em][b]PVP Server - v1.6.2[/b][/size] [size=2em][b]mattycraft.standrewsradio.com:1863[/b][/size]
We have everything at MattyCraft. 24/7 VPS etc, not of that host-at-home bullshit. This is a PVP server so no pussies allowed. Come and play!
[b]Staff[/b]: Magma828 Tom5001
[b]Plugins[/b]:
[ul][li]Bukkit[/li] [li]Essentials[/li] [li]xAuth[/li] [li]Orebfuscator[/li] [li]CoreProtect[/li][/ul]
[b]Rules[/b] (pretty relaxed, just don't be annoying and abuse stuff):
[ul][li]Minimal griefing only[/li] [li]No annoying spawn killing[/li] [li]No hacking/flying/xraying[/li][/ul]
